data.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure DVD
data.meta_description: Animated fun, DTS sound, and Will Young! What more could a young DVD fan hope for?
data.text:
Another straight to DVD sequel for Disney, "101 Dalmatians II" is its best effort yet, and it debuts on a decent quality disc.

TECHNICAL FEATURES

Picture Solid colours and razor sharp definition distinguish this excellent picture transfer.

Sound Unusually for a non-theatrical film, you get the luxury of a choice of Dolby and DTS mixes. You'd be hard pushed to tell the difference between them, but both are lively and make good - if only occasional use - of the rear surrounds.

SPECIAL FEATURES

Making of 'Dogumentary' This seven-minute look behind the scenes tries hard to appeal to kids, but just ends up being bizarre with grown adults mugging away at the camera. There's a little look at the animation process and clips of the voice actors at work.

Lost in London Can you steer the double decker bus around London to safety? With this interactive game, you have to decide the direction to take, and along the way you get little videos of the London sights.

Thunderbolt's Dressing Room Ever wanted to rustle around a star's dressing room? Here's your chance to get stuck into Thunderbolt's trailer and read his fanmail, look at pictures, find his blooper reel, and more.

Will Young Music Video One day all DVDs will come with one of these...

TECHNICAL INFORMATION

Region: 2

Chapters: 12

Ratio: 1.85:1 (anamorphic)

Sound: Dolby Digital 5.1 and DTS 5.1

Audio Tracks: English and Turkish

Subtitles: English and Turkish

Captions: English

Menus: Animated, with Dalmatians

Special Features Subtitles: None of the special features come with subtitles.

This DVD was reviewed on a JVC XV-S57 DVD player.
